site.name: Get Travel Visa
site.title: Get Travel Visa
site.description: Simplify your travel with our comprehensive visa processing platform. Get destination-based visa information, eligibility checking, and seamless application services.
site.keywords: visa application, travel visa, visa checker, visa services, international travel, visa requirements, travel documents, passport services, visa processing, travel assistance
site.ogTitle: Get Travel Visa - Your Trusted Visa Application Partner
site.ogDescription: Simplify your visa application process with our comprehensive visa checking and application services. Get expert guidance for travel visas worldwide.
site.twitterTitle: Get Travel Visa - Your Trusted Visa Application Partner
site.twitterDescription: Simplify your visa application process with our comprehensive visa checking and application services. Get expert guidance for travel visas worldwide.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: We're sorry, but there was an error loading this destination page. This might be a temporary issue.
error.helpText: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.description: We're sorry, but there was an error loading this page. This might be a temporary issue.
generic.helpText: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notFound.helpText: If you believe this is a mistake, please contact our support team.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.description: We're experiencing server issues. Please try again in a moment.
serverError.helpText: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.

networkError.title: Connection Error
networkError.description: We're having trouble connecting to our servers. Please check your internet connection.
networkError.helpText: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.

clientError.title: Request Error
clientError.description: There was an issue with your request. Please check your input and try again.
clientError.helpText: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.

validationError.title: Validation Error
validationError.description: Some of the information you provided is invalid. Please correct it and try again.
validationError.helpText: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.
